name: Astro Gunner
description:
Astro Gunner is a 2D platformer that happens in space. Player plays as an Astronaut that travels in space. A group of random robots hijacked his ship while he went out for a mission.  It is time for you to become him and take your ship back.

Game Features:

  • No gravity. You are in sapce, you can move freely using your jectpack.
  • Multiple Weapons: Pick up and use one that you like.
  • Huge Mecha Boss: The final Boss. He makes the game Hard. BEAT HIM！
  • To be Continued: More levels and mechanic will come out soon!

When you open the Zip, open the "TextyAdventureToBe" to play the game.
